definition: branch of study/administrative section/division/field/branch/stage directions/family (taxonomy)/rules/laws/to mete out (punishment)/to levy (taxes etc)/to fine sb/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: The fruit or seed of a leguminous plant such as or or lentils .
sentences.chinese: 豆科植物的果實或種子，如豌豆，菜豆，等。

sentences.english: The lean man leans on the wash bean plant to read a foliage pamphlet.
sentences.chinese: 瘦人斜靠在乾淨的豆科植物上讀葉片傳單。

sentences.english: These are derived from wild yams and soybeans.
sentences.chinese: 天然黃體酮萃取自野生山藥和豆科植物。

sentences.english: Thermopsis is one of the few genera within Fabaceae with the distribution pattern of the East Asia North American disjunction.
sentences.chinese: 黃華屬是豆科少數幾個東亞北美間斷分佈屬之一。

sentences.english: In botany, Barbasco (Lonchocarpus urucu) is part of the Fabaceae (or Leguminosae) family.
sentences.chinese: 在植物學裏，多花薯蕷屬於豆科。

sentences.english: The wild leguminous forage germplasm resources in rangeland of north part of Chifeng were investigated.
sentences.chinese: 對赤峯北部野生豆科牧草種質資源進行了調查研究。

sentences.english: The leguminous lectin played an important role in the recognition of Rhizobia .
sentences.chinese: 豆科植物凝集素在對根瘤菌的識別中起重要作用。

sentences.english: Any leguminous plant having leaves divided into three leaflets .
sentences.chinese: 任意一種葉子長成三個豆科植物。

sentences.english: The rose and the bean families belong to the same order.
sentences.chinese: 薔薇科和豆科屬於同一個目。

sentences.english: Molybdenum is an essential element consisting of nitrogenase enzyme complex.
sentences.chinese: 鉬是豆科作物固氮酶複合體組成的必需元素。

sentences.english: Legume cover crops must be planted, when new plantations are established.
sentences.chinese: 在新種植園建立時必須種植豆科保護作物。

sentences.english: All the things showed that the rhizobia could induce the root hairs on the lateral roots of some legume species.
sentences.chinese: 說明根瘤菌對有些結瘤豆科樹種的根毛具有誘導作用。

sentences.english: The lean man leans on the neat bean plant to peruse a foliage pamphlet.
sentences.chinese: 瘦人斜靠在乾淨的豆科植物上讀葉片傳單。

sentences.english: Bauhinia belongs to Leguminosae, tree, shrub or climbing vine.
sentences.chinese: 羊蹄甲屬隸屬於豆科，喬木，灌木或攀緣藤本。

sentences.english: Cassia seed, the leguminous plant, is the food material which can be used as medicine and food.
sentences.chinese: 豆科植物決明子，是藥食兩用的食品原料。

sentences.english: Molybdenum deficiency is found when legumes are grown on acid soils .
sentences.chinese: 在酸性土壤上種植豆科作物時常發現缺鉬。

definition: Graminae or Poaceae, the grass family
Asteraceae or Compositae (composites), a large family of dicotyledonous plants producing scents, includes aster, daisy and sunflower
Amaranthaceae, family of herbaceous plants containing Chinese spinach (Amaranthus inamoenus) 莧菜
Labiatae, the taxonomic family including lavender, mint
Myrtaceae (family including myrtle, rosemary, oregano etc)
Euphorbiaceae (plant family including rubber and cassava)
